Author: littlelivethings
Text: Do you still get your period? It could be your body holding on to fluid until then. Also you need to recalculate tdee/BMR as you lose weight because it goes down. And losing weight with an ED generally means we lose a lot of muscle so our BMR is less than what calculators predict.

Author: rachihc
Text: Same, like fuck this stubborn body fat, I know the metabolism slows down with deficit but this is just stupidly against physics.
